Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes. It provides functionality for managing questions, answers, reviews, user roles, and voting systems.

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database. Loads the JDBC driver, creates necessary database tables if they don't exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • createTables

      private void createTables() throws SQLException
      Creates all the necessary database tables if they don't exist. This includes tables for users, roles, questions, answers, votes, reviews, etc.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • isDatabaseEmpty

      public boolean isDatabaseEmpty() throws SQLException
      Checks if the database is empty (contains no users).
      Returns:
      True if the database is empty, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • register

      public void register(User user) throws SQLException
      Registers a new user in the database with their username, password, and roles.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing user information to register
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String userName)
      Deletes a user from the database by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to delete

    • login

      public boolean login(User user) throws SQLException
      Validates a user's login credentials against the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing login credentials
      Returns:
      True if the login is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • doesUserExist

      public boolean doesUserExist(String userName)
      Checks if a user with the given username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username to check
      Returns:
      True if the user exists, false otherwise

    • getUserRole

      public Set<String> getUserRole(String userName)
      Retrieves all roles assigned to a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username whose roles to retrieve
      Returns:
      A Set of String containing the user's roles

    • generateInvitationCode

      public String generateInvitationCode()
      Generates a new random invitation code and stores it in the database.
      Returns:
      The generated invitation code

    • validateInvitationCode

      public boolean validateInvitationCode(String code)
      Validates an invitation code against the database to check if it exists and is unused.
      Parameters:
      code - The invitation code to validate
      Returns:
      True if the code is valid and unused, false otherwise

    • markInvitationCodeAsUsed

      private void markInvitationCodeAsUsed(String code)
      Marks an invitation code as used in the database.
      Parameters:
      code - The invitation code to mark as used

    • saveQuestion

      public int saveQuestion(Question question)
      Saves a question to the database and its associated answers if any.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to save
      Returns:
      The ID of the saved question, or -1 if the operation failed

    • saveAnswer

      public boolean saveAnswer(int questionId, Answer answer)
      Saves an answer to the database for a specific question.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question this answer belongs to
      answer - The Answer object to save
      Returns:
      True if the answer was saved successfully, false otherwise

    • updateAnswerVotes

      public boolean updateAnswerVotes(int answerId, int upVotes, int downVotes)
      Updates the upvote and downvote counts for a specific answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer to update
      upVotes - The new upvote count
      downVotes - The new downvote count
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • recordVote

      public boolean recordVote(int answerId, String userName, String voteType)
      Records a vote on an answer by a user. Handles new votes, changing vote types, and removing votes when a user clicks the same vote button again.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer being voted on
      userName - The username of the voter
      voteType - The type of vote ("upvote" or "downvote")
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

    • getAnswerUpvotes

      public int getAnswerUpvotes(int answerId)
      Gets the number of upvotes for a specific answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer
      Returns:
      The number of upvotes for the answer

    • getAnswerDownvotes

      public int getAnswerDownvotes(int answerId)
      Gets the number of downvotes for a specific answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer
      Returns:
      The number of downvotes for the answer

    • getUserVoteType

      public String getUserVoteType(int answerId, String userName)
      Gets the type of vote a user made on an answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer
      userName - The username of the voter
      Returns:
      The vote type ("upvote" or "downvote") or null if the user hasn't voted

    • recalculateAnswerVotes

      public boolean recalculateAnswerVotes(int answerId)
      Recalculates the vote counts for an answer by counting votes in the Votes table and updates the Answers table with the current counts.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer to recalculate votes for
      Returns:
      True if the recalculation was successful, false otherwise

    • recordQuestionVote

      public boolean recordQuestionVote(int questionId, String userName, String voteType)
      Records a vote on a question by a user. Handles new votes, changing vote types, and removing votes when a user clicks the same vote button again.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question being voted on
      userName - The username of the voter
      voteType - The type of vote ("upvote" or "downvote")
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • loadAnswersForQuestion

      private void loadAnswersForQuestion(int questionId, Question question)
      Loads all answers for a specific question and adds them to the Question object.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question whose answers to load
      question - The Question object to add the answers to

    • findIdOfQuestion

      public int findIdOfQuestion(Question question)
      Finds the database ID of a question based on its content and author.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to find the ID for
      Returns:
      The ID of the question, or -1 if not found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error retrieving the ID

    • findIdOfReview

      public int findIdOfReview(Review review)
      Finds the database ID of a review based on its content, author, and answer ID.
      Parameters:
      review - The Review object to find the ID for
      Returns:
      The ID of the review
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error retrieving the ID

    • deleteQuestion

      public boolean deleteQuestion(Question question)
      Deletes a question from the database.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to delete
      Returns:
      True if the question was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection and statement. Should be called when the application is shutting down.

    • displayUsernamesAndRoles

      public void displayUsernamesAndRoles() throws SQLException
      Displays all usernames and their associated roles to the console. Used for debugging purposes.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • resetDatabase

      public boolean resetDatabase()
      Resets the database by dropping all objects. This will remove all tables, data, and other database objects.
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the reset was successful

    • getAllUsersWithRoles

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getAllUsersWithRoles()
      Gets all users with their roles from the database.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of User objects with their roles

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Returns the current database connection.
      Returns:
      The current Connection object

    • addRoleToUser

      public boolean addRoleToUser(String userName, String role)
      Adds a role to a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to update
      role - The role to add
      Returns:
      True if the role was added successfully, false otherwise

    • removeRoleFromUser

      public boolean removeRoleFromUser(String userName, String role)
      Removes a role from a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to update
      role - The role to remove
      Returns:
      True if the role was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteReview

      public boolean deleteReview(Integer reviewID)
      Deletes a review from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to delete
      Returns:
      True if the review was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • updateReview

      public boolean updateReview(Integer reviewID, String updatedText)
      Updates the text of a review in the database.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to update
      updatedText - The new text for the review
      Returns:
      True if the review was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • createDirectMessageTables

      private void createDirectMessageTables() throws SQLException
      Creates the necessary tables for direct messaging if they don't exist. This includes tables for chats, chat participants, and messages.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • createTrustedReviewersTable

      private void createTrustedReviewersTable()
      Creates the trusted reviewers table if it doesn't exist. This table stores users who are trusted to review content.

    • getQuestionIdForAnswer

      public int getQuestionIdForAnswer(int answerId)
      Gets the question ID associated with an answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer
      Returns:
      The ID of the question this answer belongs to, or -1 if not found

    • recordReviewVote

      public boolean recordReviewVote(int reviewId, String userName, String voteType)
      Records a vote on a review. Handles adding new votes, changing vote types, and removing votes when a user clicks the same vote button again.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review being voted on
      userName - The username of the voter
      voteType - The type of vote ("upvote" or "downvote")
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

    • getUserReviewVoteType

      public String getUserReviewVoteType(int reviewId, String userName)
      Gets the type of vote a user has made on a review.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review
      userName - The username of the voter
      Returns:
      The vote type ("upvote" or "downvote") or null if the user hasn't voted

      public int getReviewUpvotes(int reviewId)

      Returns:
      The number of upvotes

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The number of downvotes

    • updateReviewVotes

      public boolean updateReviewVotes(int reviewId, int upVotes, int downVotes)
      Updates the upvote and downvote counts stored in the Reviews table.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review
      upVotes - The number of upvotes
      downVotes - The number of downvotes
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • recalculateReviewVotes

      public boolean recalculateReviewVotes(int reviewId)
      Recalculates the vote counts for a review and updates the database.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review
      Returns:
      True if the recalculation was successful, false otherwise
